Posts.EditableText:
Is there a way to automate a computer player? Like, I would like to have the ‘computer player’ be able to press the next button without the player having to press it. Is there a way to do that?

Mars

Is there a way to automate a computer player? Like, I would like to have the ‘computer player’ be able to press the next button without the player having to press it. Is there a way to do that?

Posts.EditableText: How would you stop it from hitting the next button for EVERY level? And which one should it pick?
